A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Entertaining\, but the acting from half the crew was average which had to do somewhat with the poor writing. The comedy was forced at times\, they just blew off so many of the fan's unanswered questions\, and took too many liberties with the force. I can only wonder if Carrie Fisher's untimely passing had something to do with the underwhelming performance of many aspects of the movie.
